meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an insurrection.
meanings.sent1: The insurrectionaries gathered in the square to plan their protest.
meanings.sent2: The insurrectionaries were arrested for their involvement in the rebellion.
meanings.sent3: The insurrectionaries decided to have a peaceful sit-in instead of a violent uprising.
meanings.sent4: The insurrectionaries' determination was like a wildfire, spreading through the city.
meanings.sent5: The image of the insurrectionaries storming the gates will forever be etched in history.

meanings.sent1: The insurrectionaries' demands were clear and unwavering.
meanings.sent2: The insurrectionaries' movement gained momentum across the nation.
meanings.sent3: The insurrectionaries' fashion sense was rebellious and bold.
meanings.sent4: The insurrectionaries' spirit was contagious, inspiring others to join the cause.
meanings.sent5: The insurrectionaries' flag symbolized unity and defiance against oppression.
